title: Spring Break in Oahu
description: A family adventure in Oahu, Hawaii featuring a luxurious stay at the Four Seasons Resort, with activities like ziplining, snorkeling, and cultural experiences.

destinations.name: Four Seasons Resort Oahu at Ko Olina

segments.notes: Oceanfront rooms, suites, and studios with amenities like a spa, golf, and family-friendly activities.

property.name: Four Seasons Resort Oahu at Ko Olina

segments.roomType: Oceanfront Room, Ocean View One-Bedroom Suite, Ocean Front Studio Suite Double Accessible, Oceanfront Studio Suite King

segments.notes: Activities and experiences highlighting the natural beauty and cultural heritage of Hawaii.
segments.name: Experiences & Activities at Four Seasons Resort Oahu
segments.description: Guests can explore the island with guided hikes, ziplining, horseback riding, and the Pearl Harbor Warbird flight. Water activities include paddleboarding, snorkeling, catamaran sails, and private yacht excursions. Cultural immersion includes lei making, hula, weaving, and stargazing.

segments.notes: Transfer from Four Seasons Resort Oahu at Ko Olina to airport.
